resources.string: Write your text, and let our advanced algorithms transform your written words into spoken language.
Convert your PDFs into speech by uploading them to our app. Giving voice to your documents.
Witnessed the magic as we turn any text into lifelike speech. Use TikTalk and make your text talk.
This app allows you to effortlessly convert text into speech. Offering a seamless experience with customizable features.

- Easy text-to-speech conversion
- Upload and convert PDF files
- Customize pitch, speed, and volume
- Save speech as MP3 files
Made with Love, by Frankie B. Pinat.
